AWA.ConfirmDescription: Please use the Destiny 2 Companion App to approve DIM to modify your items.

Accounts.NoCharacters: You have no Destiny characters associated with this Bungie.net account. Try logging into a different account.

BungieService.DestinyLegacyPlatform: Bungie's services currently have a bug that prevents DIM from loading info for your Destiny 2 account if you played Destiny 1 on a last-gen console. Bungie will fix this soon, but until then you must play Destiny 1 on a current-gen console to be able to access your info.
BungieService.DevVersion: Are you running a development version of DIM? You must register your chrome extension with bungie.net.
BungieService.Difficulties: The Bungie API is currently experiencing difficulties.
BungieService.ItemUniquenessExplanation: You tried to move the '{{name}}' {{type}} to your {{character}} but that destination already has that item and is only allowed one.

BungieService.ItemUniquenessExplanation_male: You tried to move the '{{name}}' {{type}} to your {{character}} but that destination already has that item and is only allowed one.

BungieService.NoAccount: No Destiny account was found on {{platform}}. Do you have the right platform selected?
BungieService.NoAccountForPlatform: Failed to find a Destiny account for you on {{platform}}.
BungieService.NotConnected: You may not be connected to the internet.
BungieService.NotConnectedOrBlocked: You may not be connected to the internet, or an ad blocking or privacy extension may be blocking Bungie.net.
BungieService.NotLoggedIn: Please authorize DIM in order to use this app.

Csv.EmptyFile: There were no rows in the file.

CuratedRoll.BestRatedTip: This perk was selected by the curator.
CuratedRoll.ImportSuccess: Wish list loaded with information about one roll.
CuratedRoll.ImportSuccess_plural: Wish list loaded with information about {{count}} rolls.

Destiny2.ComingSoon: We will support your Destiny 2 characters in DIM in whatever capability we can shortly after the game is released on consoles. Give us a few weeks to learn about the game (and play ourselves!).

General.Detail: This information contains general information about the app at this time, as well as some information about your Bungie account and Destiny characters.
General.Privacy: The following personal information is included: Display name (gamertag etc.), your unique Bungie account ID, your account platforms, and your characters for the current account.
General.Title: General Information

DtrReview.BestRatedTip: This perk is associated with high community ratings.
DtrReview.HelpCons: Describe the negatives of this weapon (optional)
DtrReview.HelpPros: Describe the positives of this weapon (optional)
DtrReview.NoReviews: There are no reviews for this item, be the first!
DtrReview.ThankYou: Thank you for submitting a review! It will go live shortly.
DtrReview.VerifyReport: Are you sure you want to flag this review?

FarmingMode.D2Desc: DIM is preventing items from going to the Postmaster by making sure there's always one empty space per item type on {{store}}. It is moving items to the vault to make room.
FarmingMode.D2Desc_female: DIM is preventing items from going to the Postmaster by making sure there's always one empty space per item type on {{store}}. It is moving items to the vault to make room.
FarmingMode.D2Desc_male: DIM is preventing items from going to the Postmaster by making sure there's always one empty space per item type on {{store}}. It is moving items to the vault to make room.
FarmingMode.Desc: DIM is moving Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault and leaving one space open per item type to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
FarmingMode.Desc_female: DIM is moving Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault and leaving one space open per item type to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
FarmingMode.Desc_male: DIM is moving Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault and leaving one space open per item type to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.

MakeRoom.Desc: DIM is moving only Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault or other characters to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
MakeRoom.Desc_female: DIM is moving only Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault or other characters to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
MakeRoom.Desc_male: DIM is moving only Engram and Glimmer items from {{store}} to the vault or other characters to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
MakeRoom.MakeRoom: Make room to pick up items by moving equipment
MakeRoom.Tooltip: If checked, DIM will move weapons and armor around to make space in the vault for engrams.

FarmingMode.MoveTokens: Send reputation items to the vault
FarmingMode.OutOfRoom: You're out of space to move items off of {{character}}. Time to decrypt some engrams and clear out the trash!

Filter.AmmoType: Shows items based on their ammo type.
Filter.ArmorCategory: Shows armors based on their category.
Filter.Ascended: Shows items that have an ascend node and if they have been ascended or not.
Filter.Class: Shows items based on their class affinity.
Filter.Combine: Filters can be combined to narrow down your search: '{{example}}' will return all arc items with over 300 light.
Filter.ContributeLight: Shows items that have light and can contribute to your light level.
Filter.ContributePower: Shows items that have power and can contribute to your power level.
Filter.DamageType: Shows items based on their damage type.
Filter.Equipped: Items that are currently equipped on a character.
Filter.Event: Shows items from which event in Destiny 2 they appeared in.

Glimmer.Boost: Items that boost the amount glimmer gained for 10 minutes.
Glimmer.Glimmer: Shows items that are consumables that are related to gaining glimmer:
Glimmer.Item: Items that are exchangeable with Rahool for 200 glimmer.

Filter.HasShader: Shows items that have a shader applied.
Filter.InLoadout: Shows items that are included in any loadout.
Filter.Infusable: Shows items that can be infused.

Leveling.Complete: {{term}} - shows items that are totally complete - every upgrade unlocked.
Leveling.Incomplete: {{term}} - shows items that are not complete - there's still at least one upgrade to unlock.
Leveling.Leveling: Shows items at various states of leveling:
Leveling.NeedsXP: {{term}} - shows items that can still have XP put into them.
Leveling.Upgraded: {{term}} - shows items that have enough XP to unlock all their nodes, but not all the nodes have been unlocked.
Leveling.XPComplete: {{term}} - shows items that cannot have XP put into them (whether or not their upgrades have been unlocked).

Filter.LightLevel: Shows items based on their light level (Attack for Weapons; Defense for Armor).
Filter.Location: Shows items based on their location within the app. left/middle/right are the visual location of the char, and while inleftchar will always work, the other two are based on how many characters you have. current is your last/current logged char (that is marked with a yellow triangle).
Filter.Locked: Shows items based on their locked status.
Filter.NamedStat: Shows armor that has points in the named stat.
Filter.Negate: To negate a search, prefix that search term with a minus sign: {{notexample}} will find all non-engram items.
Filter.Notes: Search for items that you have tagged with custom notes
Filter.Ornament: Shows items with ornaments and filters for their status.
Filter.PartialMatch: Shows items where their name/perk has a partial match to the filter text. Search for entire phrases using quotes. the 'perk:' filter will only search perks.
Filter.Postmaster: Items that are currently in the Postmaster.
Filter.PowerLevel: Shows items based on their power level (Attack for Weapons; Defense for Armor).
Filter.Quality: Shows items based on their total stat quality percentage. '{{percentage}}' is an alias for '{{quality}}'.
Filter.RandomRoll: Shows items that drop with random rolls.
Filter.RarityTier: Shows items based on their rarity tier.
Filter.Rated: Shows all weapons that have a rating from Destiny Tracker.
Filter.Rating: Shows weapons based on their rating from Destiny Tracker.
Filter.RatingCount: Shows weapons based on the number of ratings they have for the current sandbox in Destiny Tracker.
Filter.Reforgeable: Shows items that can be reforged at the Gunsmith.
Filter.RequiredLevel: Shows items based on their required level.
Filter.Season: Shows items from which season of Destiny 2 they appeared in.

Source.BlackArmory: Item is available from the Black Armory.
Source.EDZ: Item is available from the European Dead Zone.
Source.EoW: Item is available from the Eater of Worlds raid lair.
Source.FWC: Item is available from Future War Cult.
Source.LastWish: Item is available from the Last Wish raid.
Source.Leviathan: Item is available from the Leviathan raid.
Source.Prestige: Item is available from any Prestige Raid.
Source.Raid: Item is available from any Raid or Raid Lair.
Source.Scourge: Item is available from the Scourge of the Past raid.
Source.SoS: Item is available from the Spire of Stars raid lair.
Source.Trials: Item is available from the Trials of the Nine.

Filter.StackLevel: Shows items based on the quantity of items in its stack.
Filter.Stackable: Shows items that can stack (ammo synths, strange coin, etc)
Filter.Stats: Shows items based on their stat value. The available filters are:

Tags.Dismantle: Shows items you wish to eventually dismantle.
Tags.Infuse: Shows items you wish to eventually infuse.

Filter.Tracked: Shows quests/bounties based on their tracked status.
Filter.Transferable: Items that can be moved between characters.
Filter.VideoExample: Visit {{link}} for an in-depth search filter guide.
Filter.WeaponClass: Shows items based on their weapon classes.
Filter.WeaponType: Shows weapons based on their weapon type.
Filter.Year: Shows items from which year of Destiny they appeared in.

ItemInfoService.SaveInfoErrorDescription: There's been a problem saving DIM-specific info for an item. One problem is that there is a limit on how much data can be stored - this is why tags and notes have not yet been allowed out of the Beta version. The error was: {{error}}.

Help.And: Armor with all of these perks will be used ("and")
Help.ChangeNodes: Change the Intellect, Discipline, or Strength nodes in game to what is displayed to create each loadout.
Help.Discipline: Discipline speeds up Grenade recharge time
Help.DragAndDrop: Drag and drop items into the locked buckets to build sets with only that gear
Help.Intellect: Intellect speeds up Super recharge time
Help.Lock: Lock a set of perks by clicking a lock bucket and selecting perks
Help.MultiPerk: To use armor with multiple perks together shift+click the desired perks
Help.NoPerk: If a perk doesn't appear it means that you own no armor with that perk
Help.Or: Armor with any of these perks will be used ("or")
Help.ShiftClick: Shift click an item to build sets without that gear
Help.StatsIncrease: As an items defense level increases, the stats on that item (int/dis/str) also increase.
Help.Strength: Strength speeds up Melee recharge time
Help.Synergy: Try to find armor that has ammo increasing perks for weapon types that you use.
Help.Tier11Example: 4/5/2 (a Tier 11 build) is 4 Intellect, 5 Discipline, 2 Strength (4+5+2 = Tier 11)

LightMode.HelpCurrent: Calculates loadouts at current defense levels.
LightMode.HelpScaled: Calculates loadouts as if all items were 350 defense.

LB.LockedHelp: Drag and drop any item into its bucket to build set with that specific gear. Shift + click to exclude items.

Storage.BrowserMayClearData: The browser may delete this information if you run out of space or don't visit DIM frequently.

Details.ChromeSyncStorage: If you are logged in to Chrome, this will sync your data to other Chrome instances. It does not work on the DIM website.
Details.GoogleDriveStorage: DIM can save data to Google Drive's app storage. If you sign in to Google Drive on multiple browsers, your data will be shared everywhere. This data is stored per Bungie account.
Details.IndexedDBStorage: Local storage will save your information only on this browser. Clearing your browsing data will delete this information.

Storage.Explain: DIM stores its own data separate from your Destiny data (which is maintained by Bungie.net).
Storage.ForceSync: Force sync data from Google Drive
Storage.ForceSyncWarning: This will overwrite any local data with the data from Google Drive. Are you sure you want to do that?
Storage.GDriveLogout: Your data is still in Google Drive - if you log in again, DIM will go back to using it.
Storage.GDriveSignInError: Error signing in to Google Drive:
Storage.GDriveSignInWarning:
If you already have saved DIM data in Google Drive, it will overwrite anything you have saved locally. You may want to back up your data before signing in.

Continue to sign in to Google Drive?
Storage.GoogleApiBlocked: Google Drive is not available because a content blocker has blocked the Google Drive JavaScript. Please exclude DIM from content blockers and try again.
Storage.GoogleDriveUsage: Your Google Drive has {{usage, humanBytes}} total used out of {{limit, humanBytes}}. DIM is using {{dimQuotaUsed, humanBytes}} of that. If Google Drive fills up DIM will not be able to save data.
Storage.GoogleDriveUsageNoFile: Your Google Drive has {{usage, humanBytes}} total used out of {{limit, humanBytes}}. We couldn't find info about the DIM file, which may indicate a problem. If Google Drive fills up DIM will not be able to save data.
Storage.GoogleDriveUsageUnlimited: Your Google Drive storage is unlimited.
Storage.ImportConfirm: Are you sure you want to overwrite your current settings with this version? It has {{stats}}.
Storage.ImportTooManyFiles: Please only select one file to import.
Storage.ImportWrongFileType: File is not a JSON file. It may not be a DIM backup.
Storage.RevisionsDescription: Google Drive saves the last 100 revisions of your settings. Use this page to load old versions and restore them.
Storage.TagNotesD1: {{value}} Destiny 1 items with tags or notes
Storage.TagNotesD2: {{value}} Destiny 2 items with tags or notes
Storage.Title: Data Storage
Storage.Usage: DIM is using {{usage, humanBytes}} out of {{quota, humanBytes}} available to it on this device. This includes the downloaded Destiny item databases from Bungie.net.

SyncService.GoogleDriveReAuth: To re-authorize google drive, you must restart your browser.
SyncService.OneItemTooLarge: Your save file has an item that is too large. Most likely a saved loadout has too many items.
SyncService.SaveTooLarge: Your save file is too large.  Remove saved loadouts.

Vendors.Compare: Compare with what you already have:

About.BungieCopyright: All images and content are property of Bungie. Please contact us if there are any issues.
About.DiscordHelp: Ask questions, give feedback, and get support in our Discord channels.
About.FAQAccess: How does DIM get access to my Destiny data?
About.FAQAccessAnswer: We use Bungie's app authentication to grant access to DIM to see and move your items. DIM never sees your username or password. This is the same way the Companion app works.
About.FAQD2Answer: Yes! We expect to support Destiny 2 shortly after it's launched (and we've had a chance to play the game ourselves). Expect DIM to start with the easy stuff (showing and moving your items) and working up to cooler features as we all discover what D2 has in store for us. The same DIM website will support Destiny 2 and Destiny 1 at the same time, and you'll be able to switch back and forth between your D1 and D2 characters.
About.FAQKeyboardAnswer: Yes! Press "?" to see a list of available shortcuts.
About.FAQLogout: How can I log out of DIM?
About.FAQLogoutAnswer: Click on your account in the top right of the screen and choose "Log out".
About.FAQLostItem: I lost my item using your tool!
About.FAQLostItemAnswer: Bungie doesn't allow apps to delete items (even their own app!). More than likely a transfer failed, leaving your item in the vault or on another character. You could search for the item. If that doesn't turn it up, reload the page. Check {{link}} or in game to see if your item still exists. We're sure it's still there.
About.FAQMobile: Does DIM support mobile? Will there be an app?
About.FAQMobileAnswer: The DIM website can be loaded on phones and tablets today! We're still working on making our information-rich interface comfortable on phones, though. Make sure to bookmark DIM to your home screen. We may release an app in the future, but it'll be almost exactly the same as the website.
About.GitHubHelp: If you're interested in contributing to the project, visit us at our project page on {{link}}.
About.HowItsMade: DIM is built by community developers upon the same services used by Bungie.net and the Destiny Companion App. DIM can access the items within your Guardians' inventory and the Vault for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC. You then can drag and drop items anywhere you wish to move them.
About.RedditHelp: If you have questions, comments, or suggestions - let us know!
About.Schedule_beta: This beta version of DIM is updated every time we change the code - it gets the latest features and fixes, but also the latest bugs!
About.Schedule_release: This version of DIM is updated once a week, in the afternoon on Saturdays, US Pacific time.
About.TranslationText: We use {{link}} for ease of translation. If you want to improve one of DIM's translations, join the team.
About.TwitterHelp: Be sure to follow us to stay on top of updates and real time application state information.
About.YouTubeHelp: Learn how to use DIM on our YouTube channel.

Login.Explanation: Allow DIM to view and modify your Destiny characters, vault, and progression.
Login.LearnMore: Do you want to know more?

Support.BackersDetail: Support us with a one-time or monthly donation and help us continue our active development.
Support.FreeToDownload: DIM is a product that is free to download and use. The source code for DIM is open sourced, and free to anyone to enhance. You will never see an ad in DIM. That is our commitment.
Support.OpenCollective: We are using {{link}} as a service to provide compensation to our developers for their dedication and time spent on this project.
Support.SponsorsDetail: Become a sponsor and get your logo here with a link to your site.
Support.Teespring: We also have shirts with our new logo for sale on {{link}}
